name: ECHO
description: After a century in stasis the girl En arrives at her destination: A Palace out of legend. Out here, using forgotten technologies, she hopes to bring back a life that shouldn’t have been lost. But nothing could prepare her for what she’ll face in the ancient halls below.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required) Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 3.6 Ghz/ AMD FX-8350 4.0 Ghz or Equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 570 - 1.28Gb / AMD Radeon HD 7870 2Gb or Equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required) Processor: Intel Core i7-4960X 3.6 Ghz/ AMD APU A10-6800k 4.1 Ghz or Equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 - 3Gb / AMD Radeon HD 7870 2Gb or Equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
